name: Space Runner 2049
description:
You're a robo fox and you run in space with your ally spawning in platforms under you. Dodge dangerous red blocks or you die!

Use WASD to move and Mouse Left click to spawn. Also Mouse Left Click to interact with certain buttons. It's intended for 2 players, but it can be played with 1 player.

Alsean Villanueva - Player 3D Model

Benjamin Lee - Programming

Bryson Chen - Music & SFX

Herman Wu - Programming & Animation

Starfield Skybox by Pulsar Bytes
